title: Restore site header and footer on all public pages

requirements.text: Restore the site header (SiteHeader component) so it renders correctly on all public-facing pages (homepage, account page), including the sticky top navigation with logo, Account menu entry, and the click-to-call phone button using the configured phone number (9834587806).

quotes: You remove the header and footer area

acceptanceCriteria: The SiteHeader component is visible at the top of the homepage (/) on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.
The SiteHeader component is visible at the top of the account page (/account) on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.
The header contains the Ceiling Pro logo/brand link, an Account button, and the click-to-call phone button.
The Admin entry is NOT visible in the header for public users.
The header is sticky (remains at top on scroll).

requirements.text: Restore the site footer (SiteFooter component) so it renders correctly at the bottom of all public-facing pages (homepage, account page), displaying company info, phone number (9834587806), email (ceilingpro9@gmail.com), services list, and copyright.

quotes: You remove the header and footer area

acceptanceCriteria: The SiteFooter component is visible at the bottom of the homepage (/) on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.
The SiteFooter component is visible at the bottom of the account page (/account) on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.
The footer displays the phone number 9834587806, email ceilingpro9@gmail.com, and a services list.
No GST label or placeholder is displayed in the footer.
The footer renders without layout breakage on mobile viewports.

constraints: Do not modify files listed under frontend.immutablePaths.
The Admin entry must remain hidden from the public header.
Do not alter the /riyaz admin dashboard layout or access model.
nonGoals: Redesigning or restyling the header or footer beyond restoring them to their prior working state.
Adding new navigation links or sections to the header/footer.
Changing contact phone number or email values.
